sentences.en: A fluffy gray and patches of tall grass help a cub hide on the open savanna.
sentences.cn: 在辽阔开放的热带草原上,小猎豹可以凭借身上蓬松的灰色毛皮隐藏在长长的草丛中.

sentences.en: A mature male lion rests in the grasses of the Kenyan savanna.
sentences.cn: 肯尼亚热带草原上，一头成年雄狮正在草丛里休息。

sentences.en: Any savanna's plants need a burnt to the ground by fire or grazed by antelope.
sentences.cn: 热带草原上的植物都需要一些扰动,要么经过火的洗礼,要么遭到羚羊的啃噬.

sentences.en: As they travel inland atspeeds in excess of 60 feet a year, they merge with the rich grass andscattered trees of the savanna.
sentences.cn: 它们以每年超过60英尺的速度向内地迁移，融入了热带稀树大草原的丰富草地和零星的树木。

sentences.en: Habitats in tropical and subtropical mountain forest, coniferous forest, forest edge grass, bamboo forest or savanna.
sentences.cn: 栖息于热带、亚热带的山地阔叶林 、 针阔混交林 、 林缘草坡 、 竹林或稀树草原.

sentences.en: Herds of giraffes gracefully move across the savanna in long, slow strides.
sentences.cn: 成群的长颈鹿舒缓地迈着大步,优雅地行走在大草原上.

sentences.en: Seems like there were early records of savanna blazing star in the state.
sentences.cn: 州里似乎有关于稀树大草原多种花色鲜明植物的早期记录.

sentences.en: South of the equatorial region is the tree - dotted grassland called the savanna.
sentences.cn: 赤道地区以南是一片树木稀少的草原,称为热带草原.

sentences.en: Take a dry, dormant savanna, desert or scrub and rouse it into spring with rising temperatures.
sentences.cn: 选一片干燥休眠的热带草原, 沙漠或荆棘丛,通过升高温度来唤醒它进入春天.

sentences.en: The current local vegetation is the degraded secondary vegetation: savanna and succulent thorny shrub.
sentences.cn: 现有植被为次生的稀树草坡和肉质化刺灌木.

sentences.en: The formation - types are first rearranged into four major biochores - forest, savanna , grassland, and desert.
sentences.cn: 首先把群系型重新排列成四个主要的生态区 —— 森林 、 稀树草原 、 草地和荒漠.

sentences.en: The savanna browsing black rhino has a prehensile lip for feeding on shrubs.
sentences.cn: 热带大草原的啮草黑犀牛有能卷握东西的嘴唇,可以用于吸食灌木的嫩枝叶.

sentences.en: The savanna has a wet and dry season.
sentences.cn: 在稀树草原的干湿季节.

sentences.en: The savanna is also the home of meat - eaters — the lion, leopard, and hyena who feed on the grasseaters.
sentences.cn: 大草原也是食肉动物的家乡--狮子 、 豹 、 鬣狗--它们都是以草食动物维持生命的.

sentences.en: Their habitat is tropical savanna woodlands.
sentences.cn: 它们的栖息地是热带稀树草原林地.

sentences.en: They sped upon velvet wheels across an exhilarant savanna.
sentences.cn: 他们的马车轻捷地穿过一片令人赏心悦目的大草原.

sentences.en: When the savanna grass shouldered out cactus, they weeded fiercely.
sentences.cn: 当热带稀树草原上的草疯长,挤了仙人掌, 他们就拼命除草.
